name: Zombie Maze
description:
If you love top-down shooters and mazes of which it is incredibly difficult to find a way out, then Zombie Maze will be a real godsend for you! Go through the most difficult maze from start to finish, along the way, shooting back from the bloodthirsty hordes of zombies! Don't let them get in the way!

In this game, you are waiting for dizzying shootouts with hordes of bloodthirsty zombies that will not let you go to the exit from the maze. Get out of this damn labyrinth while shooting back at the zombies on the way! Cool music and dynamic gameplay will certainly not let you get bored!

Features of the game:
Interesting gameplay and cool atmosphere!
Intuitive interface!
A very difficult and intricate maze!
Over 50 bloodthirsty zombies!
Cool music!
